name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is an oscilloscope-themed robot that belongs to the WebtrES club. With its unique combination of traits, Retrotron stands out as a vintage-inspired creation. Its box-shaped body resembles a cat, exuding a sense of curiosity and playfulness. The buttons on its console are reminiscent of a retro console, invoking nostalgia for classic gaming. Retrotron's arms and legs are made from sturdy foundry materials, giving it a strong and durable build. Its screen displays a striking red and black color scheme, adding a touch of intensity to its appearance.
